title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki-notifications on 15 May 2017 - XWiki
content:
<evalica> has joined #xwiki-notifications  
08:45 <evalica> has quit  
09:03 <VincentMassol[m]> tmortagne: good morning  
09:04 <VincentMassol[m]> BTW do you have an idea why I had to do this yesterday to get platform build to pass: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/5bad61326116731c1361bd54a6deca8b251bf761#diff-3fb2900f5c9fd62ec72b942446a5722aR59  
09:04 <VincentMassol[m]> ?  
09:04 <VincentMassol[m]> I'm referring to the 3 excludes for:  
09:04 <VincentMassol[m]> log4j, restlet servlet and servlet api  
09:04 <VincentMassol[m]> strangely the build was passing on ci  
09:04 <tmortagne[m]> vmassol: note that you are on notification chat ;)  
09:04 <VincentMassol[m]> grrr  
09:04 <VincentMassol[m]> sorry  
09:05 <VincentMassol[m]> at least it's logged now ;) lol  
09:05 <VincentMassol[m]> moving to the other chat  
09:35 <evalica> has joined #xwiki-notifications  
18:06 <evalica> has quit
